think_procedure.step_1: Identify the knob in question: autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor.
think_procedure.step_2: Research the behavior and possible values of autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor in PostgreSQL documentation.
think_procedure.step_3: Determine if there are any special values that alter the regular function of the knob.
think_procedure.step_4: If a special value exists, classify the knob as a 'special knob' and note the special value.
think_procedure.step_5: If no special value exists, classify the knob as a regular numerical knob.
